Name: Surflexers
About the game: Surflexers is a fast-paced VR game with puzzle elements where you have to make quick decisions and move along 'lines' to advance in the game. Be careful some 'lines' are lead to a dead end. Key Features: Avoid white cross boxes Do not fall Collect coins Ride along lines! Be quick!
